metadata.title: CVE-2024-36956 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal/debugfs: Free all thermal zone debug memory on zone removalBecause thermal_debug_tz_remove() does not free all memory allocated forthermal zone diagnostics, some of that memory becomes unreachable afterfreeing the thermal zone's struct thermal_debugfs object.Address this by making thermal_debug_tz_remove() free all of the memoryin question.Cc :6.8+ <stable@vger.kernel.org> # 6.8+

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
